description: Prohorov calls Lucas to invite him over for another round, but Lucas cant make it. Luckily, Prohorov already has the sexy, rosy-cheeked Misha Petrov, who has added a few tattoos since his debut in To Moscow with Love. The guys flip-flop in several positions before cumming on each others smooth, muscular chests.
title: Andrei Prohorov and Misha Petrov
